import folium

m = folium.Map(zoom_start=3, location=[41.799332, -35.896883])

tooltip = "NATO countries"

folium.Marker(
    [42.374417, -94.956242], tooltip=tooltip
).add_to(m)
folium.Marker(
    [53.355498, -2.239292], tooltip=tooltip
).add_to(m)

m
